definitions: Used to indicate that something happens during the time that something else is happening.
Used to state the reason for something; because.
Used to indicate that something happens in the way that something else happens or is true.
Used to introduce a statement of fact that is already known or obvious.
examples: As I was walking home, I saw an old friend.
As it was getting late, we decided to go home.
Do as I say, not as I do.
As you know, I'm not a big fan of spicy food.
